page.title: 08Health (contd) & a Shop.
page.content:
{THE HEALTH CENTRE} There are 8 doctors in the health centre and 12 district nurses who visit schools around the area. Mums take their babies to be weighed on Mondays. Also each doctor sees 15 patients a day as an average.
{THE SHOP ON THE GREEN} 8, The Green, Syston, was built in 1780. It is now an antiques shop but, in the past, it has been a private school. a sweet shop, a corn merchants and a decorators' shop. It used to belong to the house next door to it but now they are two separate houses. The roof is made of local, Swithland slates. On the floor are quarry tiles. The water pump in the back garden dates back to 1788. There is also a brick built well.
